Hi Lasse,

> If your client can control headers, you could use Accept-Langu=
age (http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html#sec14.4) - leav=
ing out the Accept-Language header would then be the canonical representati=
on.
> 
> Thoughts?

Could you clarify this with an example?

Cheers,

Ruben=
